meta.description: HIGH-PERFORMANCE campaign feeder - Processes leads in parallel batches

documentation.purpose: Add enriched leads to Instantly campaigns in bulk for multi-broker scale
features: Parallel batch API calls to Instantly
Bulk database updates (single RPC call per campaign)
flow: 2. Get all fresh leads (returns array of 100s-1000s)
3. Bulk assign campaigns (processes entire array in one code execution)
4. Group by campaign type (3 arrays: no_more_payments, cash_unlocked, high_equity)
- Bulk add all leads to Instantly campaign
- Bulk update campaign_history for all leads
